about_the_game:
ZH group official QQ group: 1030084534 , from time to time there are news, group friend welfare updates, and follow-up wonderful works preview.
The "Desert Blossom" demo contains the first two chapters of the full version of the game and lasts about 40-50 minutes.

Desert Blossom - a yuri adventure story of young girls.


Mars, a newly grown desert elf, is encouraged by her fathers to set out to test her future as the patriarch of the Desert clan.On the journey, Mars meets the kind and brave elf nun Agres, the little fox girl YuanPu(the kind that Ms.伊藤 can't refuse), and the halfling profitmaker Lunger Kenser. The girls' yuri adventure begins. The four under the coincidence of chance to beat down the giant beast, was the local old count Meker invited to perform the task of finding gems for the nobility, Mars and others for their own goals readily accept. However, on the way, they found clues, extinction goddess - Void began to wake up. Viod, born to her last common ancestor, Mother LUCA, falls madly in love with and imprisons her sister Gaia, the goddess of life.Viod will set off a bloody storm in the Fusuma continent, and everyone's goal is to add one more - to stop Viod!The adventure then turned into a whirlwind...

[Basic operation]It is recommended to use keyboard/gamepad to operate the game more smoothly and silky. ※ Note: The support of the controller adopts the default button. If there is any problem with the matching, please add the above QQ group or Bilibili to contact the group leader Plones. We will solve it for you in time.
Shift Toggles the Walk/Run Tab key (in conversation) to review the message
Z/left mouse button to confirm/talk X/right mouse button to cancel/menu
Q Key Next W Key Previous Arrow key ↑↓←→ Control action
F2 displays frame rate F3 freely resizes the window
F4 Full Screen Game F5 Restart the game
  • Use the X button or the right mouse button to open the main menu. - Press the Tab key during a conversation to review nearly 60 messages, or use the backpack - important item - conversation review book.
  • Open Knapsack - Quest * or Knapsack - Important Item - Event Tip Book * to know what to do next. Backpack - important items - Warcraft map * or in the battle X button -↓ drop-down menu can know the information of the monster. The same props map * allows you to grasp the value and effect information of props, weapons, armor accessories and other items.

  • * Easy and enjoyable combat, interaction, collection system, even players who have only played text games (Gal, AVG, ADV, etc.) can easily navigate combat. Desert flowers on sale more than 60 days so far, used to text players feedback harvest unanimous praise, don't worry about it will not be too difficult, please enjoy the fun of RPG game.
  • 18 CG base images, 34 gallery (including split) CG available for collection.
  • 25 character sketches, multiple character avatars, all art resources are manually drawn without AI.
  • Nearly 30 kinds of beautiful and lovely original design Pokemon monsters! Semi-turn-based combat, optimized original UI and combat effects compared to the RM engine default.
  • Large enough to explore the map, NPG interaction, 150+item collection, gallery collection, 75kinds in monster map collection and many other RPG unique gameplay
  • A hundred solo Tours of the country, the theme of the West fantasy, because the Baihe mainland is an immigrant country, you can also see characters with Oriental aesthetic characteristics (Yuan Pu, silk kite, etc.). Both magic and technology fly together, the east and the west magic of the sky.
  • Multiple endings 4NE+1TE, 4 normal endings (2 good endings, 2 bad endings) +1 true ending
  • Tentatively implanted voice for the new TE small theater, if the response is OK, then ZH group's next JRPG, the new work will be · main story · comprehensive implantation · voice.






Group Leader & Planner: Plones Script & Production: 普伦内斯
Main program: Drill_up
Numerical planning: Maciabone (Green Pepper, Steam masterpiece "Return: Witness")
Copy editing & Proofreading: 周明君、yrjphf
Art: 秋葬、朽木、一世长安、树懒、柳树精、抹茶千层、Wit, Dionysus
UI: 土豆、狼姬、UI哥 Monster Designer: 熊大洲、Wit
Plug-in sequence: Drill_up, MOG, YEP, Krz, Gt50
Map material: FSM
Music material: RpgMakerMV-DLC, 音楽の卵
Production software: RPG Maker MV
Thanks for sponsorship: Xiao Jiu, Wolf Princess of Love and Justice, MOE Xin Trembling, Blank, Takashi's mother
